scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf examples/*/node_modules && rm -rf exploration/*/node_modules
scripts.clean:node_modules:with-cache: npm run clean:node_modules && yarn cache clean
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.reinstall: npm run clean:node_modules && yarn install && yarn run rebuild
scripts.release: echo "======= Lerna Releasing jay =======" && npm run test && lerna publish
